sections.heading: consultant; reexamination; when
sections.text: The director may require a consultant, after notice and hearing and a finding that the consultant lacks competency, to submit to reexamination if the director has reason to believe that the consultant lacks competence.SourceLaws 1980, LB 481, ยง 19.

44-2624.Insurance consultant; reexamination; when.

The director may require a consultant, after notice and hearing and a finding that the consultant lacks competency, to submit to reexamination if the director has reason to believe that the consultant lacks competence.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 481, ยง 19.
